text: Now I want to remind you, although you 1:5 already know this, that after the Lord 69.4% ¦ already know all things, that after Jesus ECM NA28 SBL {0.2%} TH {0.2%} ¦ know all things, that after the Lord once for all NA27 0% ¦ already know all things, that after the Lord WH 0%already know this, that after the Lord saved a people out of the land of Egypt, he subsequently destroyed those who did not believe.
